QuestData.Title: Peace at Last
QuestData.Description: I wish we had a way of letting James Hyal's wife and son know that we have brought their murderers to justice.$B$B<Captain Vimes produces a small wreath decorated with flowers.>$B$BThere are some who say that their spirits will know, even if we cannot reach them. It's not much, but I'd like you to lay this wreath at the Hyal family monument. It's one of the stones in the graveyard just north of Theramore's gates.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Garran Vimes at Foothold Citadel wants you to lay the Wreath at the Hyal Family Monument.
QuestData.RewardText: <Captain Vimes smiles slightly as you relate the events you witnessed at the Hyal family grave.>$B$BIt's good to know that they understand. You didn't tell them about James, did you?$B$BI'll deliver his wife's message to him, but I doubt he'll understand.
